page.title: 17My House
page.content: My house has 11 windows. There are 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, a dining room, a kitchen and a hall. In the kitchen there is a cooker and a sink. The living room has a three-piece suite, a coffee table, a cabinet and a television. There is a wooden chair that my dad made. In my bedroom there is a bed by the window and a shelf above with my pottery on and some dolls. Opposite the window is my wardrobe, next to that is my desk. At the bottom of my bed is a bookshelf with lots of books on it. In the bathroom there is a bath, a wash basin and a toilet. We have another room where we keep the freezer and the washing machine.
